project_specific_ipynb_code.reduced_model_output_paper¶

Functions

calculate_scale_factors(EI_balance_df, …)

Calculates the inhibitory spatial kernel scale factor for each cell, from a EI_balance_df: pandas dataframe, generated by make_EI_balance_df() target_WNI: float or int

chunker(seq, size)

expand(mdb_or_folder)

generate_spiketimes(stim, cellNr_dict[, …])

hacks roberts single cell parser to generate pointcell activity defined in network param file

get_postsynaptic_cells_list_and_presynaptic_cells_dict(…)

get_somadistance_lookup(cell[, segment_labels])

returns label, soma distance of beginning and soma distance of end of each segment

get_somadistance_lookup_parallel(post_cells_dir)

creates delayed objects to compute soma distances of all cells in post_cells_dir, which is generated by cortex in silico (see getting_started.ipynb)

get_surround_whiskers(whisker)

param whisker

str (in the format “A1”, “C4”, “Delta”)

make_EI_balance_df(spike_times_ongoing, …)

Sets up and returns the dataframe for scaling the inhibitory kernel of each cell in order to restore EI balance.

test_apply_release_probability()

test_get_SA_array()
